title: Longhorns Daily News : Texa Quinn Ewers just made the Davey OBrien Award watch list
body_text:
Drake Maye. Bo Nix. Caleb Williams. Taulia Tagovailoa. The Texas Longhorns’ Quinn Ewers.
Longhorns Daily News: Texas’ Quinn Ewers just made the Davey O’Brien Award watch list
Plus: Ricky Williams earns legacy honor
What do these names have in common?
Among many others, they all just made the Davey O’Brien Award watch list.
